FUNC.NAME: ausPostal
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to enable or disable the auspostal decoder.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only auspostal labels:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="all_decoders:disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="auspostal:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:
The following example enables the scanner to read all labels except auspostal:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="all_decoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="auspostal:disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:
Above example can also be written as shown below:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-all_decoders" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-auspostal" Content="disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports auspostal.
